list.description:
A reupload of my previous Hibiki sight, now without the diamond in the middle

Other sight can be found at https://live.warthunder.com/post/1026462/en/

集成测距极简瞄准镜
以游戏默认瞄准镜为蓝本，全代码编程函数图像。可用于游戏内任何坦克，任何弹药。
目前论坛内常见的自定义瞄准镜，大多是通过编程，绘画出一个固定的瞄准镜。此类瞄准镜优势在于可以绘画出大量内容，例如实际弹道。但最大问题在于，绘画式的瞄准镜并不能用于所有坦克，甚至不能用于同一辆坦克的不同弹药。例如apfsds与heatfs，atgm，这三类弹药弹道完全不同，如果全部绘画在瞄准镜上则过于复杂。
我在参考了论坛内大量作品后，集成了简单测距功能，并重新设计了瞄准镜主体，使其拥有了简便直观，集成功能的特色。且以游戏自带瞄准镜为基底，使用函数坐标绘画，可以完美用于游戏内所有坦克，且可以根据不同载具，弹药的弹道性能，即时切换标尺分划，精准度上和游戏自带瞄准镜完全一致。
注意，此瞄准镜是我在前苏联T80U坦克所使用的1G46型瞄准镜基础上改进而来，自带简略测距图表以t80u的12倍镜为基准，目标车高设定2.5m，最左边分划为800m，此后一格200m。不同载具炮镜倍率不同，仅能作为粗略测距（我试着将图表数据写上去，但是似乎函数式的炮镜是不能自定义文本的，所以只好作罢）。


Based on the default aiming reticle in the game, I have programmed a function that can be use...

This is my custom sight for the Type 75 SPH, sadly, it gets inaccurate over a certain distance on the test drive field, about 6km it is about 37,5m short, and I don't know how badly ambiant temperature affects it...
The sight goes up to 11km

Hi War Thunder players,
This is a package sight for rank VI USSR. Most of them was made by @RideR2 and @MLRS, I just edited a little bit to make them look more potato :D
If they have any bugs, please comment and I'll try to fix them.
Next week I'll upload rank V!!!
If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Enjoy and have nice days, guys!!!

* Note:
- My TV sights only work normally in 1080p :(

- 19/10/2025: Added sights for BMD-4M2.

These are the sights I use. There are two versions. One for high velocity guns. Another for low velocity. The sights are universal, which means they can be used with any vehicle. Just download the zip file and unzip it into your main War Thunder directory.
